title: Universe/Geometry/DistanceToPlane
description: Distance [km] from a target point to a plane. The plane can be either one of the 3 planes of a Cartesian reference frame (if "plane" is provided), or an arbitrary plane (if "planeNormal" is provided).

target.description: Name of the target/spacecraft whose distance from the plane will be computed

center.description: Either the name of a point passing through the plane (if "planeNormal" is provided), or the name of the origin of the Cartesian reference frame

axes.description: Either the name of the axes used for the computation (if "planeNormal" is provided), or the name of the axes of the Cartesian reference frame

plane.description: Cartesian plane ("yz", "xz", "xy") with respect to which the distance is computed

anyOf.description: A vector perpendicular to the plane with respect to which the distance is computed
A direction representing the vector perpendicular to the plane with respect to which the distance is computed
